Package com.codingchili.core.configuration

Interface Configurable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeConfigurable, BaseConfigurable, LauncherSettings, SecuritySettings, ServiceConfigurable, StorageSettings, SystemSettings, ValidatorSettings
    public interface Configurable
extends java.io.Serializable
    Base configuration interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getPath()
      Get the path of a loaded configuration file.
      default void save()
      Saves the configurable back to disk.
      default io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject serialize()
      Serializes a configuration for permanent storage, allows the configuration container to remove computed attributes that are used when serializing over network but not to disk.
      default Configurable setPath​(java.lang.String path)
      Set the path of a configurable to allow saving to the same location it was loaded from.

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        java.lang.String getPath()
        Get the path of a loaded configuration file.
        Returns:
        the directory path to the configuration file.

      • setPath

        default Configurable setPath​(java.lang.String path)
        Set the path of a configurable to allow saving to the same location it was loaded from.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the configurable on disk for reloading and saving.
        Returns:
        fluent

      • serialize

        default io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject serialize()
        Serializes a configuration for permanent storage, allows the configuration container to remove computed attributes that are used when serializing over network but not to disk.
        Returns:
        a JsonObject that is equal to the JsonObject loaded from disk.

      • save

        default void save()
        Saves the configurable back to disk.
